title: Chosen Mage
description: Sora, a dhampir mage hybrid, has been chosen by the Goddess to right a past wrong.As her powers continue to grow, she must learn to master her magic in time for the upcoming battle with the Council. Sora will do anything to protect her family, even welcome an enemy into her home from her former life within the Seattle Stronghold. With her Vampire Mate by her side, and the Clutchâ€™s Shifters at her back, she faces the ultimate evil in; Chosen Mage.Clutch Mistress Series-Vampire MageAllied MageChosen MageAlpha Mage The Sundering Demon's Rage
author: Janelle Peel
